LanguageData.ET_i_polymer.label: ET.Plastic
LanguageData.ET_i_polymer.description: A mysterious object excreted by Oread.
LanguageData.ET_Cylinder.label: ET.Cylinder
LanguageData.ET_Cylinder.description: ET.Plastic container.\nIt is possible to collect and store "ET.Liquid Ether"
LanguageData.ET_Liquid_Ether.label: ET.Liquid Ether
LanguageData.ET_Liquid_Ether_DRY.label: ET.Liquid Ether (DRY)
LanguageData.ET_Liquid_Ether_DRY.description:
Mysterious liquid secreted by Naiad
It has been confirmed that when taken orally into the body, it activates the secretion of oxytocin, but the principle behind this has not been elucidated.

24/h
LanguageData.ET_Liquid_Ether_WET.label: ET.Neutralizer
LanguageData.ET_Luciferin.label: ET.Luciferin
LanguageData.ET_Luciferin.description:
Potency inducer.
E-luciferase, an alternative component of mechanite, promotes virtual adrenergic action and improves physical function.
As a result of clinical trials, no reactions such as drug dependence were detected in the subjects.

24/h
LanguageData.ET_Medicine.label: ET.Medicine
LanguageData.ET_Medicine.description: ET.investigational drug.\nadministered orally, it instantly repairs physical defects and medical conditions.
LanguageData.PSI_Plus.label: PSI-Plus
LanguageData.PSI_Plus.description: PSI ability development drug.\nPsylink levels can be obtained by administering blood medication.
LanguageData.NymphMilk.label: Royal milk
LanguageData.NymphMilk.description: A milky liquid secreted by a Nymph.\nVery nutritious very tasty.
LanguageData.N_Lactoferrin.label: N-Lactoferrin
LanguageData.N_Lactoferrin.description:
A factor D-binding protein purified from homunculus secretion.
taken orally, it can be expected to improve immunity and homeostasis.

10/days
LanguageData.ET_Embryo.label: ET.Embryo
LanguageData.ET_Embryo.description: Recovery cells collected from the body of a Nymph.
LanguageData.ET_N_Embryo.label: Embryo N-TYPE
LanguageData.ET_N_Embryo.description: An archetypal seed embryo stage individual that has restored the cryoliposome information salvaged from the Dryad species and expressed its traits.
LanguageData.ET_S_Embryo.label: Embryo S-TYPE
LanguageData.ET_S_Embryo.description: Oread embryo stage individual with multiple HO alleles arranged in S type (C+D).
LanguageData.ET_L_Embryo.label: Embryo L-TYPE
LanguageData.ET_L_Embryo.description: Naiad embryo stage individual with multiple HO alleles arranged in L type (C+W).
